department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程
department.en: International Master of Business Administration program

goal.ch:
“Financial Statement Analysis Taught in English
Conduct the fundamental analysis on a company and finish a high quality security analysis report“
goal.en:
“Financial Statement Analysis Taught in English
Conduct the fundamental analysis on a company and finish a high quality security analysis report“

outline.ch:
“Week 01: Introduction
Week 02-04: Financial Projection ＆ Modeling
Week 05-07: Business Analysis
Week 08-09: Financial Analysis
Week 10-13: Valuation Methods: Cash Flow Based, Multiple Based
Week 14: Investment Recommendation
Week 15~: Other Optional Topics
Final Exam Week: Final Presentation
1st hour activities: Model presentations, progress reports“
outline.en:
“Week 01: Introduction
Week 02-04: Financial Projection ＆ Modeling
Week 05-07: Business Analysis
Week 08-09: Financial Analysis
Week 10-13: Valuation Methods: Cash Flow Based, Multiple Based
Week 14: Investment Recommendation
Week 15~: Other Optional Topics
Final Exam Week: Final Presentation
1st hour activities: Model presentations, progress reports“

textbook.ch:
“Recommended Readings: 
Security Analysis and Business Valuation on Wall Street (2nd ed.) by Hooke, Wiley, 2010
Investment Banking: Valuation, Leverage Buyouts, and Mergers ＆ Acquisitions (3rd ed.), by Rosenbaum and Pearl, Wiley, 2021
Other References: 
Financial Modeling and Valuation: A Practical Guide to Investment Banking and Private Equity (2nd ed.) by Pignataro, Wiley, 2022
Financial Statement Analysis: A Valuation Approach (International Edition) by Soffer and Soffer, Pearson, 2002“
textbook.en:
“Recommended Readings: 
Security Analysis and Business Valuation on Wall Street (2nd ed.) by Hooke, Wiley, 2010
Investment Banking: Valuation, Leverage Buyouts, and Mergers ＆ Acquisitions (3rd ed.), by Rosenbaum and Pearl, Wiley, 2021
Other References: 
Financial Modeling and Valuation: A Practical Guide to Investment Banking and Private Equity (2nd ed.) by Pignataro, Wiley, 2022
Financial Statement Analysis: A Valuation Approach (International Edition) by Soffer and Soffer, Pearson, 2002“

gradMethod.ch:
“Valuation Model 20％
The Security Analysis Report 60％
Class Participation 20％“
gradMethod.en:
“Valuation Model 20％
The Security Analysis Report 60％
Class Participation 20％“

ch.competencies: 獨立思考和解決問題能力

ch: 系所:限國際經營管理碩士學位學程。年級:限一年級。
系所:限國際經營管理碩士學位學程。
en: Department:International Master of Business Administration program only.Year:First Year only.
Department:International Master of Business Administration program only.
